summary: In Greece, in the early part of the 20th century, two brothers from a wealthy landowning family have opposite views on how the poor workers who work on their land should be treated.
cast: Nikos Kourkoulos|Mairi Hronopoulou|Giannis Voglis|Faidon Georgitsis|Zeta Apostolou|Notis Peryalis|Eleni Kriti|Angelos Antonopoulos|Manos Katrakis|Athinodoros Prousalis|Kostas Baladimas|Nikos Pashalidis|Dimitris Bislanis|Kostas Gennatas|Spiros Maloussis|Hristoforos Zikas|Vasos Andronidis|Giorgos Xydis|Nikos Kouros|K. Mitrakos|K. Mantilaris
title: Sangre en la tierra
